items.content_html: A lightweight library for manipulating large JSON objects in the browser via an aggregation pipeline inspired by MongoDB's concepts. Designed for use in front-end applications, this library allows you to perform aggregation, filtering, and transformation operations directly on objects stored in IndexedDB, LocalStorage, or in-memory,

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: client-trace is a lightweight and flexible NPM package for generating unique IDs to identify users based on their HTTP request data. This package extracts essential information such as headers, IP addresses, and device attributes to produce a reliable unique identifier, making it ideal for tracking users across client-server interactions.
items.title: deepsingh245/client-track: client-trace is a lightweight and flexible NPM package for generating unique IDs to identify users based on their HTTP request data. This package extracts essential information such as headers, IP addresses, and device attributes to produce a reliable unique identifier, making it ideal for tracking users across client-server interactions.
